document_data.name: Light Tube
document_data.creator: [[Cadderly Bonaduce]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Light Tube''' was an invention by [[Cadderly Bonaduce]].
document_data.Design:
The tube itself was a foot-long cylinder two inches in diameter. It consisted of two parts, with one end covered by a metal cap.

A disk was inserted in the tube, which had been enchanted by [[Histra]], a priestess of [[Sune]], with a dweomer of light as bright as pure sunlight.
document_data.Use: The metal cap on the tube shielded the light. When popped off, a focused beam of light was projected. The light beam can be adjusted by a twist of the upper part of the cylinder.<ref>
